item.title: Learn Aws Solution Architect Associate the Fastest Way
item.description: The main topics will be discussed in this article: Hands-on practice tutorials The architecture patterns : real cases example AWS provide us “The SAA-C03 Exam”, if you can pass the exam, you will get this certificate AWS Solution Architect - Associate About the exam: Level : Associate Length: 130 minutes Format: 65 questions Cost : $150 USD Delivery Method : Testing center or online Scoring: scaled score between 100 - 1000.
